title: CONTEST! Win a MEGA tubeless setup prize pack from Stan’s NoTubes!
content:
Stan’s NoTubes is the first name most of us think of when setting up tubeless tires with sealant, but there’s a lot more going on at the brand! Did you know they have a “Race” sealant, too? Or seen their unique Darts for plugging those larger holes? What about lightweight alloy valve stems and a sealant injector tool?

Now, you can win one of FIVE mega prize packs, each one stuffed with these awesome tubeless setup goodies!

  • 1 x Stan’s Race Sealant, Quart – $44
  • 1 x Stan’s Sealant, Quart – $34
  • 1 x Stan’s DART Tool – $25
  • 1 x Stan’s DART Refill – $20
  • 1 x Stan’s Alloy Valve Stems – $24
  • 1 x Stan’s Injector – $9.95
  • 1 x Stan’s Logo T-shirt – $7.50
  • 1 x Stan’s Wool Socks – $16.50

Just answer a few questions below and you could win this killer prize package that retails for more than $180 from Stan’s!

SURVEY CONTEST RULES: By submitting your response, you agree to these rules, terms & conditions: Only one entry per person. Multiple entries from same person will disqualify that person. All participants must provide a valid email address, as that is how Stan’s NoTubes will contact the winner(s). All entrants’ email addresses may be added to the email newsletter/marketing lists for Bikerumor.com and Stan’s NoTubes. Any emails sent from either party will contain “unsubscribe” options. Contest closes just before midnight (11:59pm) PST on Saturday July 24th, 2021. Winner(s) will be selected at random and results are final. Winner(s) will have one week from the date of notification of winning to respond, after which Stan’s NoTubes and/or Bikerumor.com reserve the right to choose an alternate winner and original winner forfeits all right to any prize(s).
author: Ron Frazelle
